txt.en: You have turned in a stack of trophies for a modest reward suitable for a collector such as yourself.
Wanted: Broken sword sheaths from the Dourhands and goblins in Ered Luin. Collect them and deliver them to Dorri at Gondamon to earn favour with Thorin's Hall.
'Proof positive that we are working toward reclaiming Ered Luin for the glory of the dwarves.\n\n'Your efforts will echo through the halls.'
'Golbins or Dourhands, either one is acceptable, but bring us a trophy that shows you working towards driving them from our land.'
Thorin's Hall Task: Broken Sword Sheaths
Dorri wants broken sword sheaths. Dorri can be found standing at the west gate of Gondamon.
Deliver the broken sword sheaths to Dorri at Gondamon
You have accepted a task to acquire broken sword sheaths. You are to deliver them to Dorri at the western gate of Gondamon to earn favour with Thorin's Hall.
Wanted: Broken sword sheaths from the Dourhands and goblins in Ered Luin.
